item.name: Injidup Point
item.description: The development of the substantial Injidup Point vineyard began in 1993; there are now 16 ha planted to cabernet sauvignon, shiraz, cabernet franc, merlot, sauvignon blanc, pinot noir and semillon. Most of the grapes are sold to other makers, with a small amount of wine reserved for mail order sale and other local distribution. An extensive native garden surrounds the property, which has views to the adjacent Leeuwin Naturaliste National Park.
